00056 /*-- Globals -------------------------------------------------------*/

00058 /* The frontend name (client name) as seen by other MIDAS clients   */
00059 char *frontend_name = "Ebuilder";
00060 
00061 /* The frontend file name, don't change it */
00062 char *frontend_file_name = __FILE__;
00063 
00064 /* frontend_loop is called periodically if this variable is TRUE    */
00065 BOOL ebuilder_call_loop = FALSE;
00066 
00067 /* A frontend status page is displayed with this frequency in ms */
00068 INT display_period = 3000;
00069 
00070 /* maximum event size produced by this frontend */
00071 INT max_event_size = 10000;
00072 
00073 /* maximum event size for fragmented events (EQ_FRAGMENTED) */
00074 INT max_event_size_frag = 5 * 1024 * 1024;
00075 
00076 /* buffer size to hold events */
00077 INT event_buffer_size = 10 * 10000;
00078 
00081 INT lModulo = 100;

00093 EQUIPMENT equipment[] = {
00094    {"EB",                /* equipment name */
00095     {1, 0,                   /* event ID, trigger mask */
00096      "SYSTEM",               /* event buffer */
00097      0,                      /* equipment type */
00098      0,                      /* event source */

00100      TRUE,                   /* enabled */

00139 INT eb_begin_of_run(INT rn, char *UserField, char *error)
00140 {
00141   printf("In eb_begin_of_run for run:%d User_field:%s \n", rn, UserField);
00142    lModulo = atoi(UserField);
00143    return EB_SUCCESS;

00160 /********************************************************************/
00221 INT eb_user(INT nfrag, BOOL mismatch, EBUILDER_CHANNEL * ebch
00222             , EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent, INT * dest_size)
00223 {
00224   INT i, dest_serial, frag_size, serial;
00225   DWORD *psrcData;
00226 
00227   if (mismatch){
00228     printf("Serial number do not match across fragments\n");
00229     for (i = 0; i < nfrag; i++) {
00230       serial = ((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment)->serial_number;
00231       printf("Ser[%i]:%d ", i + 1, serial);
00232     }
00233     printf("\n");
00234     return EB_USER_ERROR;
00235   }
00236 
00237   // Destination access
00238   dest_serial = pheader->serial_number;
00239   printf("DSer#:%d ", dest_serial);
00240 
00241   // if (dest_serial == 505) return EB_USER_ERROR;
00242   // Loop over fragments.
00243   for (i = 0; i < nfrag; i++) {
00244     frag_size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment)->data_size;
00245     serial = ((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment)->serial_number;
00246     printf("Frg#:%d Dsz:%d Ser:%d ", i + 1, frag_size, serial);
00247     // For Data fragment Access.
00248     psrcData = (DWORD *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment) + 1);
00249   }
00250 
00251   printf("\n");
00252   return EB_SUCCESS;
00253 }
